groq/blogwizard

Generates blog articles from video or audio using Groq and Whisper

View on index · View in 3D Map

Related repos

  • Transcribes audio to clipboard using Groq Whisper
  • AI tool for auto-generating podcasts from news using Groq and ElevenLabs
  • Static blogging template built with Astro, Tailwind, and shadcn/ui
  • Open-source blogging platform with Notion-like editor
  • Automates video creation from text-to-speech and motion graphics
  • Blogging engine without a database
  • Generates podcasts from documents using local AI
  • Converts files, performs OCR, and transcribes audio in a browser
  • AudioCraft: code for generating music, sound effects, and audio compression from raw audio and textinputs
  • Static blog writing client for Windows, macOS and Linux
